Definition: Level of school education that the student attends.

SIF.Definition: Year or academic level of student.

OtherStandards.Definition: Grade(s) for which a user with role 'student' is enrolled. The permitted vocabulary should be defined as part of the adoption and deployment process.

Collections.Name: NAPLAN Student Registration
Collections.Commentary: The student's current year level.  Note: For NAPLAN Online purposes, valid “Year Level” values are 3,5,7,9, UG.
